ptdb.kernel.bl.load

Class DBModelFetcher

  • java.lang.Object
    • ptdb.kernel.bl.load.DBModelFetcher

  • public class DBModelFetcher
extends java.lang.Object
    This is the business layer that interfaces with the database for retrieving models.
    Since:
    Ptolemy II 10.0
    Version:
    $Id$
    Author:
    Lyle Holsinger
    Accepted Rating:
    red (lholsing)
    Proposed Rating:
    red (lholsing)

      static java.util.ArrayList<XMLDBModel> load(java.util.ArrayList<XMLDBModel> modelList)
      Given an ArrayList of XMLDBModel objects that are not populated with MoML strings, query the database to obtain the MoML and then return the revised ArrayList.

    • Method Detail

      • loadUsingId

        public static XMLDBModel loadUsingId(java.lang.String id)
                              throws DBConnectionException,
                                     DBExecutionException
        Given a model id representing the model to load, return an XMLDBModel object that contains the MoML.
        Parameters:
        id - The id of the model to be loaded.
        Returns:
        An XMLDBModel object from the Database, containing its MoML string.
        Throws:
        DBConnectionException - Thrown if there a problem with the database connection.
        DBExecutionException - Thrown if there is a problem executing the database task.

      • load

        public static XMLDBModel load(java.lang.String name)
                       throws DBConnectionException,
                              DBExecutionException
        Given a model name representing the model to load, return an XMLDBModel object that contains the MoML.
        Parameters:
        name - The name of the model to be loaded.
        Returns:
        An XMLDBModel object from the Database, containing its MoML string.
        Throws:
        DBConnectionException - Thrown if there a problem with the database connection.
        DBExecutionException - Thrown if there is a problem executing the database task.

      • load

        public static java.util.ArrayList<XMLDBModel> load(java.util.ArrayList<XMLDBModel> modelList)
                                            throws DBConnectionException,
                                                   DBExecutionException
        Given an ArrayList of XMLDBModel objects that are not populated with MoML strings, query the database to obtain the MoML and then return the revised ArrayList.
        Parameters:
        modelList - An ArrayList of XMLDBModel objects without associated MoML strings.
        Returns:
        An ArrayList of XMLDBModel objects populated with their respective MoML strings. An empty list is returned if no objects could be added.
        Throws:
        DBConnectionException - Thrown if there a problem with the database connection.
        DBExecutionException - Thrown if there is a problem executing the database task.
